channel.title: Fail on Maniacal Labs
channel.description: Recent content in Fail on Maniacal Labs

item.title: Stick A Pin In It
item.description: Stick a Pin in It I’ve been working on a side project that uses some of the WS2812 based LED strips, just like the “NeoPixel” strips from Adafruit. Unfortunately, I began having problems with the strips in that they suddenly stopped responding to any control signals being sent to them.

item.title: PCB Fail
item.description: PCB Fail Ever since first trying KiCad and OSH Park I have been a little hooked on being able to throw together a custom PC, have it professionally manufactured, and shipped to me within a couple weeks.
